sentences.en: Have you met my husband Roy?
sentences.cn: 你见过我的丈夫罗伊吗？

sentences.en: He was taken up with the reconciliation of husband and wife.
sentences.cn: 他忙于做夫妻间的调解工作.

sentences.en: Her husband was not a womaniser by any stretch of the imagination.
sentences.cn: 她老公绝对不是个拈花惹草的人。

sentences.en: Husband and wife are now taxed separately on their incomes.
sentences.cn: 现在夫妻双方分别按各自的收入纳税。

sentences.en: Husband and wife turned coldly accusing backs toward each other.
sentences.cn: 这两口子冷冷地背向而坐,互相埋怨.

sentences.en: Husband and wife were similarly successful in their chosen careers.
sentences.cn: 夫妇俩在各自所选择的事业上都很成功。

sentences.en: My grandmother died of grief soon after her husband's death.
sentences.cn: 祖父去世不久,祖母就因悲伤过度而死了.

sentences.en: She said her future husband would not let her make another film.
sentences.cn: 她说她的未婚夫不会让她再拍电影了. (此句用wouldnot let, 意思是“阻止”)

sentences.en: She was certainly not the type to murder her husband.
sentences.cn: 她绝不是那种会谋杀亲夫的人。

sentences.en: She went to pray for the soul of her late husband.
sentences.cn: 她去为亡夫的灵魂祈祷。

sentences.en: Some people think that husband and wife should never work together.
sentences.cn: 有人认为夫妻二人绝不应该在一起工作.

sentences.en: The majority of British women adopt their husband's surname when they marry.
sentences.cn: 大多数英国女性结婚后随夫姓。

sentences.en: They lived together as husband and wife for years.
sentences.cn: 他们结为夫妇,共同生活了很多年.

sentences.en: Your husband's family has behaved monstrously.
sentences.cn: 你婆家人的行为实在可恶。

words.tran_cn: 丈夫的；节俭的；善于管理农活的

trans.tran_cn: 丈夫，〈英〉管家，〈古〉节俭的管理人，船舶管理人
trans.tran_en: the man that a woman is married to
to be very careful in the way you use your money, supplies etc and not waste any

trans.tran_cn: 节俭地使用，〈罕〉做…的丈夫
